idea:
What we do:  
AUREUS is the Customer Intelligence & Experience company that enables Insurers to deliver superior customer experience leading to greater customer retention, loyalty and lifetime value. The AI platform learns from a variety of structured and unstructured data sets to measure the customer experience in real time to determine an Aureus SentiMeter™ score for all customers.  
 
How we do it:  
We do this by leveraging AI & Machine learning technologies and delivering the actionable insights in Natural Language at the Point of Decision. 
  
Key Facts: 
Processed 50Million + policies on our platform
name: AUREUS ANALYTICS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Roadwings International Pvt. Ltd., a renowned, Multimodal Logistics operator has launched under their banner, technological based platform, under the name of GOCON, which acts as a platform for supplying Trailers for Container Transportation movement on PAN India basis.  This web portal is an aggregator model which guarantees placement of Trailers in Nhava Sheva area as its core strength. This also provides a lucrative opportunity for established Transporters to register and generate revenue by optimised utilisation of their Trailers.  We envisage a system where any container to be moved can be done so through our network of Trailers within 24 hours with the help of latest technology and connectivity.
GOCON serves as a platform to connect the right owner of Trailer to its potential customer by identifying the specialisation of their routes and expertise.Our network of Trailers ensure guaranteed placement of Trailers for in and around Nhava Sheva  this helps in fulfilling our motto which is that no Trailer should be idle and no cargo be delayed.

We encourage the stake holders to register and participate on the web portal to successfully transport their cargo via trailers at a cost effective rate and in efficient timely fashion.

Also established transporters are advised to register to enhance productivity and increase sales for their businesses.


www.gocon.in
name: GOCON

idea: A company engaged in food business focusing on providing fresh, authentic, low calorie, nutritional specialized food without the use of any preservatives, artificial flavours or chemicals making it one of the healthy option for consumption. The Company also provides Vegan and Keto-friendly options. The Company is also into catering business offering to small groups an enriching flavour of the food processed under temperature-controlled Bain Marie.
name: MAIZ HOSPITALITY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Snowtown is leisure (amusement) entertainment company specialized in Snow & Ice Entertainment both indoor & outdoor.
Snowtown will act as a developer-Operator of snow based theme park and intend to develops state-of-art solutions for Snow & Ice entertainment giving maximum real experience to customers of all age groups.
Our Snow-how is based on Innovative and Original concepts for affordable weekend getaway.
name: HARSH-YASH ENTERPRISES PVT.LTD

idea: To provide Rooftop Solar power Installation to generate electrical power by non conventional, conventional methods including coal, gas, lignite, oil, biomass, waste, thermal, solar, photo voltaic solar and solar thermal, hydel, geohydel,wind and tidal waves. We also offer consultancy services to design, to manage power generating plants and other related matters.
name: ACUMEN RENEWABLES ENERGY

idea: Sunvest Capital (“Sunvest”) is India's First Dedicated Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC) focusing on the rooftop solar market. Sunvest provides affordable loans to residential, commercial and industrial customers looking to go solar. While India has huge solar potential, financing acts as a barrier for solar adoption. We combine years of deep solar intelligence with expertise in finance to solve financing concerns for customers considering solar.
name: Sunvest Capital

idea:
Data is everywhere, Making sense of data is an art and science combined.
Companies today are at different maturity level of the data story example some are discovering the data within the data enterprise, some are struggling to find value out the data.
Morning Blaze helps companies in the data journey starting from business consulting to delivering business benefits using data techniques such Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence.
Morning Blaze builds relationship.
name: Morning Blaze

idea:
